description: This course examines the development of differing approaches to some aspect of Russian life and culture as presented in the classical texts of Russian literature. Actual topics vary according to year and instructor. Offered periodically. Counts toward Russian studies and Russian area studies majors; does not count toward Russian language major. Prerequisites: WRIT 120, equivalent or permission of the instructor.
name: Top: Scandals in Russian Literature
prerequisites: Prerequisites: WRIT 120, equivalent or permission of the instructor.
title: Topics in Russian Literature
